headline: Chevron ramps up Venezuelan oil shipments as US tightens control
summary: The company deploys 15 vessels this month, shipping at least 200,000 barrels a day under its US license

headline: Chevron Amasses Largest Fleet in Almost a Year to Ship Venezuelan Oil
summary: Chevron has taken more oil after shipments by the so-called dark fleet vanished, following the US’s pledge to clamp down on illicit oil trading and Maduro’s ouster earlier this year.  The US also has enlisted traders Trafigura Group and Vitol Group to help sell as much as 50 million barrels of oil.  Chevron’s shipments are all bound for US refiners, including Valero Energy Corp. and Phillips 66.

headline: Shell Weighs Exit From Argentina's Vaca Muerta Shale Assets
summary: SHEL is exploring a potential sale of its Vaca Muerta shale assets as it reshapes its global portfolio amid rising interest in Argentina's energy basin.

headline: Halliburton Prepares for Quick Comeback in Venezuela With US Approval
summary: HAL plans a swift Venezuela restart pending U.S. approval and payment safeguards, aiming to offset weak U.S. shale demand and fuel Latin America growth.

headline: Stocks Set for Muted Open After Trump’s Tariff Threats, Big Tech Earnings and Fed Meeting in Focus
summary: March S&P 500 E-Mini futures (ESH26) are down -0.05%, and March Nasdaq 100 E-Mini futures (NQH26) are down -0.14% this morning, pointing to a muted open on Wall Street as President Trump’s tariff threats against Canada and the looming risk of a partial U.S. government shutdown curbed risk appetite at the start of a busy week.

headline: US oil capital Houston buzzes as industry limbers up for Venezuela oil rush
summary: By Arathy Somasekhar and Nathan Crooks HOUSTON, Jan 26 (Reuters) - In a downtown Houston bar, Matthew Goitia, a director at Pelorus Terminals, lays out his early idea to refurbish and build marine terminals that can blend and export crude and ship chemical products in Venezuela. headline: China Has Vast Oil Assets in Venezuela. Now It Risks Getting Muscled Out.
